entries.title: Revised Skydance Offer Gives Paramount Shareholders Opportunity to Cash Out at Roughly $15 a Share
entries.description: The proposed price represents a 26% premium from where the nonvoting shares of Paramount Global closed Friday.

entries.title: Republicans Call Judicial System 'Weaponized' After Trump Conviction
entries.description: The former president’s allies are pushing false claims of biased courts in wake of hush-money trial.

entries.title: Mexicans Poised to Elect First Woman President
entries.description: Voters went to the polls in Mexico as two women face off in an election that will result in the country’s first female head of state.

entries.title: Readers React to the Trump Verdict in New York
entries.description: ‘The most shameful American political event since our mortal political tragedies of 1968.’

entries.title: Funny How the UAW Never Loses Fair and Square
entries.description: What happened to respecting the vote and not questioning election results?

entries.title: Sotomayor, Make Way for the Vice President
entries.description: How do you solve a problem like Kamala?

entries.title: In Praise of the USS Carney
entries.description: Terrorists could fire missiles at any time, and the crew had only 9 to 20 seconds to perform the detect-to-engage sequence.

entries.title: Stay in Your Lane, De Niro
entries.description: Hyperbolic and self-righteous commentary is the sole purview of politicians and newspaper opinion writers.

entries.title: South Africa's Ruling Party, Chastened by Vote, Faces Difficult Coalition Talks
entries.description: With all votes counted, Nelson Mandela’s African National Congress slumped to just 40%, losing its absolute majority for the first time since the end of apartheid.

entries.title: OPEC+ Agrees to Extend Production Cuts in Bid to Boost Oil Prices
entries.description: The deal likely signals oil prices will remain elevated through the U.S. presidential election. .

entries.title: U.S. Presses Two-Lane Diplomacy on Gaza, Facing Road Bumps in Both
entries.description: The U.S. is seeking to end the war through a cease-fire proposal backed by President Biden, while also joining talks this weekend to reopen the route for aid into Gaza from Egypt.

entries.title: Donald Trump, the Devil and Thomas More
entries.description: Respect for precedent means treating like cases alike. Think what that means for democracy.

entries.title: Mexico After AMLO: A One-Party State?
entries.description: For six years, other institutions have limited the socialist president’s damage.

entries.title: Winning the Stanley Cup Is More Taxing Than Ever
entries.description: As the NHL playoffs near their conclusion, it’s becoming increasingly clear that teams from low-tax states have a sneaky advantage.

entries.title: Donald Trump Is a Heavyweight With Raucous UFC Crowd
entries.description: The presumptive Republican presidential nominee received a frenzied reception at a fighting event in Newark, N.J., on Saturday night, two days after becoming the first former president ever convicted of a crime.

entries.title: 'Endgame 1944' Review: A Savage Conflict in the East
entries.description: A ferocious military campaign put the Red Army within striking distance of Berlin and Stalin in a position to dictate postwar terms.

entries.title: Asics Stock Catches Fire Along With Its Dad Sneakers
entries.description: The 75-year-old Japanese sneaker brand is having a moment. So are its shares.

entries.title: Donald Trump Joins TikTok Years After Trying to Ban the App
entries.description: The Republican presidential candidate posted a 13-second clip of himself at a UFC event Saturday night via the social-media platform.

entries.title: More »
entries.description: It turns out more money does buy more happiness. But there's a "tax" to it.

entries.title: Their Loved Ones Died in Plane Crashes. Now They Fight for Change.
entries.description: The Boeing 737 MAX and Colgan Air accidents have spurred grieving families to push for accountability and safety improvements—with some recent wins.
